org.ndnx.ndn.impl.security.keys
Class SecureKeyCache

java.lang.Object
  org.ndnx.ndn.impl.security.keys.SecureKeyCache
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class SecureKeyCache
extends Object
implements Serializable

A container for our private keys and other secret key material that we have retrieved (e.g. from access control). TODO: finish mechanism that saves the key cache between runs.

See Also:

getKey

public Key getKey(byte[] desiredKeyIdentifier)
Retrieve a key specified by its digest To restrict access to keys, store key cache in a private variable, and don't allow references to it from untrusted code.

Parameters:
desiredKeyIdentifier - the digest
Returns:
the key

containsKey

public boolean containsKey(byte[] keyIdentifier)
Checks whether we have a record of a key specified by its digest, or in the case of a private key, the digest of the corresponding public key.

Parameters:
keyIdentifier - the key digest.
Returns:

containsKey

public boolean containsKey(ContentName keyName)
As the map from name to content is not unique, this might not give you a definite answer, and you should still check the digest.

Parameters:
keyName -
Returns:

getKeyID

public byte[] getKeyID(ContentName versionedName)
Get the key ID associated with a name, if we have one. Currently store keys under versioned names -- might be nice to effectively search over versions of a key... This can be used to look up the key, allowing the caller to be sure they have the right key.

getPrivateKey

public Key getPrivateKey(byte[] desiredPublicKeyIdentifier)
Returns the private key corresponding to a key identified by its digest. To restrict access to keys, store key cache in a private variable, and don't allow references to it from untrusted code.

Parameters:
desiredPublicKeyIdentifier - the digest of the public key.
Returns:
the corresponding private key.

                          byte[] publicKeyIdentifier,

Records a private key and the name and digest of the corresponding public key.

Parameters:
keyName - a name under which to look up the private key

pk - the private key

addSecretKey

public void addSecretKey(ContentName keyName,
                         byte[] identifier,
                         SecretKey sk)
Records a secret (symmetric) key and the name and digest of the corresponding identifier (which should be a "PublisherPublicKeyDigest".

Parameters:
keyName - a name under which to look up the private key
identifier - the digest of the public key
sk - the secret key

size

public int size()
Return a total count of keys in this cache.

Returns:

merge

public void merge(SecureKeyCache cache)
Merges the SecureKeyCache with a given SecureKeyCache. The original SecureKeyCache dominates, i.e. the merged cache will contain the names in the original cache if there are any conflicts

Parameters:
cache - the SecureKeyCache to merge with

Debugging utility to print the contents of the secureKeyCache
